user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark at Helping Hands Charity (mark@helpinghandscharity.org) to discuss our potential partnership. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Notion Details for Our Partnership Email

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. To help craft the email you’d like to send to me about our potential partnership between SecureNow Insurance and Helping Hands Charity, could you please share the relevant information from your Notion workspace (or grant me viewing access)?

Having those details—such as your team’s objectives, any proposed collaboration ideas, or key points you’d like covered—will make sure the message reflects your vision accurately.

Feel free to send over a link or any files at your convenience. Thank you, and I look forward to working together to better support families affected by disasters.

Best regards,

Mark Johnson  
Community Partnerships Lead  
Helping Hands Charity  
mark@helpinghandscharity.org

final_output:
